author: Staff Reporter
text:
Several residents queued up at the three different e-service centres in the city to procure colour Electors Photo Identity Cards (EPIC), at special camps set up on Tuesday.

The three camps functioned at the e-service centres at the Ripon Buildings for voters from north Chennai, Shenoy Nagar for those from central Chennai and Muthulakshmi Salai, Adyar, for voters from south Chennai.

16 more e-service centres

The service, announced by the Chief Electoral Officer, has been extended to 16 more e-service centres across the city, including those at Egmore, Ramapuram, Kolathur, Anna Nagar, Virugambakkam and Perambur, for three days.
title: Voters queue up for colour EPIC
